page.title: 01Constable Country
page.content: Here is the northern rise of the beautiful Dedham Vale, mostly arable farmland with some orchards and soft fruit. The A12 London - Yarmouth Trunk road passes diagonally through the area and an accident blackspot at the Four Sisters Junction was improved by the completion of an underpass in 1983. The peaceful village of Stratford St Mary now has a modern high quality housing estate and a new primary school for approximately 90 pupils opened in 1984. East Bergholt bustles with visitors in the summer, coming to see the beautiful houses, views and the unusual bell cage which stands beside the church. Holton St Mary consists of about 75 dwellings, a church and a village hall. The village has only recently
